hints.title: Hints: Zones
hints.hint1: Zones are the same as zones in homey and the temperature will be the averge of all enabled thermometers in the zone.
hints.hint2: A monitored zone will emit alerts whenever the temperature goes out of bounds.
hints.hint3: An enabled zone will not emit any alerts but all other action cards for temperature change, maxmimum and minimum will still work.
hints.hint4: A disabled zone will be ignored by the application.
hints.hint5: The values shown for each zone is the average temperature, the minimum temperature today and the maximum temperature today.
hints.hint6: You can enable these hints in the settings section.

hints.title: Hints: Devices
hints.hint1: Devices are various thermometers found in Homey.
hints.hint2: A enabled device will contribute to the average temperature of the zone it is in.
hints.hint3: An disabled zone will be ignored by temperature manager.
hints.hint4: You can enable these hints in the settings section.

hints.title: Hints: Settings
hints.hint1: Minimum and maximum temperature will be used by the tooWarm and TooCold cards to trigger your flows.
hints.hint2: If you disable (set to never) Time to reset max/min you can instead use a flow card to reset them at your own schedule if for instance you want weekly min/max.
hints.hint3: You can enable these hints in the settings section.
